name: Geological Survey Mek
description:
A clockwork meka designed for surveying underground resources and certain minerals.
Due to the fact that the desired metal type can be set, this device has proven very popular among Treasure Hoarders and Adventurers alike.

investigation.name: Clockwork Meka
investigation.description: A machine made possible by the advanced engineering technology of Fontaine and its energy sources.\nAlso an excellent assistant to thieves and brigands.
